summary: THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS DO FUNCTION CORRECTLY MOST OF THE TIME.  WHEN SWITCHED ON TO THE INTERMITTENT SETTING THEY USUALLY OPERATE AT LOW SPEED RATHER THAN INTERMITTENT.  WHEN SWITCHED OFF THEY USUALLY CONTINUE WIPING FOR MANY CYCLES AND THEN STOP SEEMINGLY RANDOMLY ANYWHERE IN THERE PATH OF TRAVEL.  ALSO, THE WINDSHILED WASHER NO LONGER PUMPS FLUID.
